title: Massaman Curry Paste
source: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
categories: Lemongrass and Lime (Pig & Khao) - Leah Cohen
ingredients: 1¾cups Red Curry Paste or Maesri brand
directions: 1. Combine the cumin, coriander, cardamom, cinnamon, and peanuts in a spice grinder and grind into a powder.

2. Put the curry paste into the bowl of a food processor, add the spice mixture, and blend until combined. Scrape into a bowl. The paste can be stored, tightly covered, in the refrigerator for up to 3 days and in the freezer for up to 3 months.
